title: Online ECON 102 or ACCT I S 100?
body: Any advice on whether I should take ECON 102 or ACCT I S 100 online this summer through UW-Madison? I took ECON 101 last semester with Kelley and want to try and bypass 102 if possible, but I've heard that ACCT 100 on campus is really tough. Suggestions?
comments: Idk if you would be open to taking the classes elsewhere, but I took acct 100 through UW Colleges Online over summer and it was very easy.
